Package SnakeGame

Class StaticObstacle

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
SnakeGame.StaticObstacle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollider, IRenderable, IObstacle
public class StaticObstacle extends GameObject implements IObstacle
Represents an immovable obstacle the snake should avoid
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • StaticObstacle

      public StaticObstacle(Polygon obstacle, boolean isFilled, char drawChar)
      Instantiates a StaticObstacle without colour
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the obstacle's shape
      isFilled - if the obstacle should be drawn as filled
      drawChar - the character the obstacle should be drawn with

    • StaticObstacle

      public StaticObstacle(Polygon obstacle, boolean isFilled, char drawChar, TerminalColour.Foreground terminalColour, Color graphicalColor)
      Instantiates a StaticObstacle
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the 'hitbox' of the obstacle
      isFilled - if the obstacle should be drawn as filled
      drawChar - the character the obstacle should be drawn with
      terminalColour - the colour to draw the obstacle with in the terminal (can be null)
      graphicalColor - the colour to draw the obstacle with in the graphic interface (can be null)

    • isDeepCollision

      public boolean isDeepCollision()
      Description copied from interface: ICollider
      If the Collider should test for deep collisions. Deep collisions use inclusive intersection and are also triggered if one collider contains the other.
      Specified by:
      isDeepCollision in interface ICollider
      Returns:
      if the collider should test for deep collisions
